Pirlo English learners welcome to daily

let's find out what it means and how you

yearn or you can say to yearn for
something
have you ever craved for something that
is hard to get or achieve or had a
desire for something that is beyond your
reach at the moment tea urn basically
means to have a strong desire or longing
for something to yearn for something
means to need it badly
usually you yearn for something that you
can't achieve or get easily it also
means to have a deep affection or a
desire for something when you have an
intense feeling of lacking something or
you care and treasure something very
much it means you are yearning for
example when you are away from home for
many years you always yearn for your
mother's love as the word year and shows
the action of a strong desire it is a
verb okay now that you know what to
yearn means let's take a look at some
example sentences to see how you can use
it in your daily conversation example 1
jennifer is starstruck and always yearns
for a life style as rich and lavish as
the Hollywood stars
example two after two decades of
imprisonment the prisoners yearned for
their freedom example three after then
quit smoking he would still yearn for a
cigarette in his free time example four
though some is happy being a manager
somewhere in his heart he still yearns
to be the CEO which seems like a distant
reality as of now example 5 after
breaking up with Mary Peter realized her
importance in his life and started to
yearn for her love example 6
after a long hectic day at work Shawn
yearned to go to the beach with his kids
example 7 when William's son moved
overseas to pursue higher education
William couldn't stop yearning to see
him example 8 when I was on a business
trip to Europe
I always yearned for some Tom made
vegetarian food example 9 most teenagers
yearn for the day when they can make
their own bucks and take their own
decisions in life example 10 all the
young participants worked very hard as
they were yearning to win the Miss World
title example 11 after facing the
problem of drought in the remote desert
all the villagers started yearning for
some rainfall example 12 Lisa was
yearning to watch the oscar-winning film
but her tight schedule didn't allow her
